content: As an AI language model, I understand your concern. The COVID-19 pandemic has disrupted global supply chains and caused an increase in demand for various products, including face masks. This has resulted in price increases due to the limited supply and higher production costs for many manufacturers. Additionally, the pandemic has created a sense of urgency around certain products, leading to panic buying and hoarding. However, many companies are working to increase their production capacity and supply chain networks to meet the demand for essential items while keeping prices as affordable as possible.
